string.name: dva_gun_detail
string.b: Twin rotating cannons that slows movement while in use. Does not need to reload

resources.string: Falloff: Begins at 10 metres, max falloff at 20

string.name: dva_gun_Spread
string.b: Spread Angle: shots spread 4.15 degrees from centre

string.name: dva_gun_movespeed
string.b: Move Speed: -40% movement penalty while shooting, except while using Boosters

string.name: dva_gun_ROF
string.b: Rate of Fire: 1 burst every 0.15 seconds

string.name: dva_defense_matrix_detail
string.b: Forward facing cone which destroys all enemy bullets and projectiles that enter it. Cannot fire Fusion Cannons while in use

string.name: dva_defense_matrix_duration
string.b: Duration: using all resource lasts 2 seconds

string.name: dva_defense_matrix_recharge_rate
string.b: Recharge Rate: 16% resource per second after not in use for 0.75 seconds

string.name: dva_boosters_detail
string.b: Fly forwards in the direction you are facing for the duration

string.name: dva_boosters_damage
string.b: Damage: deals 10 damage to targets flown into

string.name: dva_boosters_movespeed
string.b: Move Speed: +118% bonus to movespeed, or 12 metres/s

string.name: dva_boosters_duration
string.b: Duration: 2 seconds, cancellable by pressing again

string.name: dva_ultimate_detail
string.b: D.Va ejects from her MEKA and it explodes after a delay. If boosting, the MEKA continues boosting even when ejected

string.name: dva_demeched_detail
string.b: When D.VAs MEKA is destroyed, she ejects from it and continues fighting

string.name: dva_ultimate2_detail
string.b: D.Va calls a new MEKA down and enters it. Instantly charges after Self-Destruct detonates, or if D.VA is Resurrected

string.name: dva_ultimate2_damage
string.b: Damage: the MEKA deals 250 damage to nearby targets when it lands

string.name: orisa_gun_detail
string.b: Automatic projectile weapon that deals high damage but slows movement while in use

string.name: orisa_gun_spread_angle
string.b: Spread Angle: shots spread 4.15 degrees from centre

string.name: orisa_halt_detail
string.b: Travelling charge that when detonated(by choice or on contact with a surface) pulls nearby enemies to its origin

string.name: orisa_fortify_detail
string.b: Orisa temporarily becomes immune to being moved or stunned by enemies, takes reduced damage, and cannot be headshot

string.name: orisa_ultimate_detail
string.b: Deployed device that increase damage of all allies within line of sight of it.

string.name: reinhardt_gun_detail
string.b: Melee weapon with high damage and sweeping range

string.name: reinhardt_shield_detail
string.b: Large shield in front of Reinhardt. Cannot attack or use abilities while in use

string.name: reinhardt_charge_detail
string.b: Reinhardt charges forward, potentially pinning enemies he comes in contact with, and dealing massive damage if he charges them into a wall

string.name: reinhardt_ultimate_detail
string.b: Cone extending from reinhardt that stuns enemies on the ground in its affecting range

string.name: reinhardt_passive_detail
string.b: Reinhardt is displaced less by abilities that knockback

string.name: roadhog_gun_detail
string.b: Projectile shotgun with a ranged alternate fire

string.name: roadhog_takeabreather_detail
string.b: Roadhog heals himself and reduces damage he takes for the duration

string.name: roadhog_hook_detail
string.b: Roadhog throws a hook a distance forward, if it hits an enemy, it pulls them into him

string.name: sigma_gun_detail
string.b: Dual fire explosives that ricochet off surfaces

string.name: sigma_barrier_detail
string.b: floating barrier travels forward. travelling can be stopped at any time by releasing the button

string.name: sigma_grasp_detail
string.b: Destroys bullets and projectiles directly in front of sigma, and gains shields based on damage blocked after the duration

string.name: sigma_accretion_detail
string.b: After a short cast, fires an arcing projectile that explode,s stuns, and knocks back on impact

string.name: sigma_ultimate_detail
string.b: Sigma gains the ability to fly, lifts enemies in a targeted area, and pulls them back down to the ground

string.name: winston_gun_detail
string.b: Close Range gun that damages all targets in range simultaneously

string.name: winston_jumppack_detail
string.b: Winston lunges forward, dealing contact damage when he lands

string.name: winston_ultimate_detail
string.b: Winstons health doubles, his jump pack cooldown is reduced, and is restricted to high knockback melee attacks

string.name: ball_gun_detail
string.b: Automatic weapons that reloads in ball form

string.name: ball_claw_detail
string.b: A grappling claw latches onto a wall or ceiling, and Wrecking Ball can swing from it, dealing damage at a high enough speed

string.name: ball_roll_detail
string.b: Wrecking ball transforms into a ball, hiding his head and increasing movespeed

string.name: ball_shield_detail
string.b: Wrecking Ball gains temporary shields, gaining more based on the number of nearby enemies

string.name: ball_piledriver_detail
string.b: Wrecking Balls slams into the ground from a height, damaging and knocking enemies upward

string.name: ball_ultimate_detail
string.b: Deployed field of static explosives, which detonate on contact with an enemy.

string.name: zarya_gun_detail
string.b: Beam weapon with explosive alternate fire. Damage scales with Energy

string.name: zarya_barrier_detail
string.b: Personal Barrier, damage dealt to it increases energy

string.name: zarya_barrier_projected_detail
string.b: Projected Barrier that surrounds allies, damage dealt to it increases energy

string.name: zarya_ultimate_detail
string.b: Projectile that, on collision, creates a gravity well, which pulls enemies in

string.name: zarya_passive_detail
string.b: Particle Cannon deals more damage based on energy count.
